verses.verse: <S%G2532>It<s%> <S%G1096>happened,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G5055>finished<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5128>these<s%> <S%G3056>words,<s%> that he <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G3101>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples,<s%>

"You <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> the <S%G3957>Passover<s%> <S%G1096>is<s%> <S%G2532>coming,<s%> and the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> will be <S%G3860>delivered<s%> up <S%G1519>to<s%> be <S%G4717>crucified.<s%>"

<S%G5119>Then<s%> the chief <S%G749>priests,<s%> <S%G2532>the<s%> <S%G1122>scribes,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4245>elders<s%> of the <S%G2992>people<s%> were gathered <S%G4863>together<s%> in the <S%G833>court<s%> of the high <S%G749>priest,<s%> who was <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G2533>Caiaphas.<s%>
They took <S%G4823>counsel<s%> together <S%G2443>that<s%> they might <S%G2902>take<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> by <S%G1388>deceit,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> kill <S%G615>him.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> they <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3361>"Not<s%> <S%G1722>during<s%> the <S%G1859>feast,<s%> <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361>a<s%> <S%G2351>riot<s%> occur <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G2992>people.<s%>"
<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1096>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G963>Bethany,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3614>house<s%> of <S%G4613>Simon<s%> the <S%G3015>leper,<s%>

a <S%G1135>woman<s%> came <S%G4334>to<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> an alabaster <S%G211>jar<s%> <S%G3464>of<s%> very <S%G927>expensive<s%> <S%G3464>ointment,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> she poured <S%G2708>it<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2776>head<s%> as he sat at the <S%G345>table.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1492>when<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G23>this,<s%> they were indignant, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>"Why<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G684>waste?<s%>
<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G3464>ointment<s%> <S%G1410>might<s%> have been <S%G4097>sold<s%> for <S%G4183>much,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1325>given<s%> to the <S%G4434>poor.<s%>"

<S%G1161>However,<s%> <S%G1097>knowing<s%> <S%G2424>this,<s%> Jesus <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G5101>"Why<s%> do <S%G3930>you<s%> <S%G2873>trouble<s%> the <S%G1135>woman?<s%> <S%G1063>Because<s%> she has <S%G2038>done<s%> <S%G2041>a<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G1691>me.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> you <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G4434>poor<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1438>you;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> you <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1691>me.<s%>
For in <S%G906>pouring<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G3464>ointment<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4983>body,<s%> she <S%G4160>did<s%> it to prepare me <S%G4314>for<s%> <S%G1779>burial.<s%>

Most <S%G281>certainly<s%> <S%G1437>I<s%> <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G3699>wherever<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> Good <S%G2098>News<s%> is <S%G2784>preached<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2889>the<s%> <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> this <S%G846>woman<s%> has <S%G4160>done<s%> <S%G2980>will<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> be <S%G2980>spoken<s%> of as <S%G3778>a<s%> <S%G3422>memorial<s%> of <S%G846>her.<s%>"
<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G1427>twelve,<s%> who was <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G2455>Judas<s%> <S%G2469>Iscariot,<s%> <S%G4198>went<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the chief <S%G749>priests,<s%>

and <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G5101>"What<s%> are <S%G2309>you<s%> willing to <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G3427>me,<s%> that <S%G2504>I<s%> should <S%G3860>deliver<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> to <S%G5213>you?<s%>" <S%G1161>They<s%> <S%G2476>weighed<s%> out <S%G694>for<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G5144>thirty<s%> pieces of <S%G694>silver.<s%>
<S%G575>From<s%> that <S%G5119>time<s%> he <S%G2212>sought<s%> <S%G2120>opportunity<s%> <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G3860>betray<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> on the <S%G4413>first<s%> day of unleavened <S%G106>bread,<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G4226>"Where<s%> do you <S%G2309>want<s%> us to <S%G2090>prepare<s%> for <S%G4671>you<s%> to <S%G5315>eat<s%> the <S%G3957>Passover?<s%>"

<S%G1161>He<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G5217>"Go<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4172>city<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> a certain <S%G1170>person,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>tell<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1320><s%> 'The Teacher <S%G2036>says,<s%> <S%G3450>"My<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> at <S%G1451>hand.<s%> I will <S%G4160>keep<s%> the <S%G3957>Passover<s%> <S%G4314>at<s%> your <S%G4571>house<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3101>disciples.<s%>" '"

<S%G2532>The<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4160>did<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4929>commanded<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G2090>prepared<s%> the <S%G3957>Passover.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1096>when<s%> <S%G3798>evening<s%> had <S%G1096>come,<s%> he was <S%G345>reclining<s%> at the table <S%G3326>with<s%> the twelve <S%G1427>disciples.<s%>

<S%G2068>As<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> were <S%G2068>eating,<s%> he <S%G2036>said,<s%> "Most <S%G281>certainly<s%> I <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> will <S%G3860>betray<s%> <S%G3165>me.<s%>"

<S%G2532>They<s%> <S%G3076>were<s%> <S%G4970>exceedingly<s%> <S%G3076>sorrowful,<s%> and <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G3004>ask<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1510>"It<s%> <S%G1473>isn't<s%> me, is <S%G1510>it,<s%> <S%G3385>Lord?<s%>"

<S%G1161>He<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> "He who <S%G1686>dipped<s%> his <S%G5495>hand<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G5165>dish,<s%> the <S%G3778>same<s%> will <S%G3860>betray<s%> <S%G1700>me.<s%>

The <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> <S%G5217>goes,<s%> even <S%G2531>as<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3759>woe<s%> <S%G444>to<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>Man<s%> is <S%G3860>betrayed!<s%> It would <S%G2258>be<s%> <S%G2570>better<s%> <S%G846>for<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1080>had<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> been <S%G1080>born.<s%>"

<S%G2455>Judas,<s%> who <S%G3860>betrayed<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G611>answered,<s%> <S%G1510>"It<s%> <S%G1473>isn't<s%> me, is <S%G1510>it,<s%> <S%G3385>Rabbi?<s%>" He <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G4771>"You<s%> said <S%G3004>it.<s%>"

<S%G2068>As<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> were <S%G2068>eating,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2983>took<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> gave <S%G2127>thanks<s%> for <S%G2532>it,<s%> and <S%G2806>broke<s%> <S%G2532>it.<s%> He <S%G1325>gave<s%> to the <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G2983>"Take,<s%> <S%G5315>eat;<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4983>body.<s%>"

He <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G4221>cup,<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G2168>thanks,<s%> and <S%G1325>gave<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3956>"All<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4095>you<s%> drink <S%G846>it,<s%>

<S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G1242>the<s%> <S%G2537>new<s%> <S%G1242>covenant,<s%> which is <S%G1632>poured<s%> out <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> the <S%G859>remission<s%> of <S%G266>sins.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> I <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G3754>you<s%> that <S%G3361>I<s%> <S%G4095>will<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4095>drink<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G1081>fruit<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G288>vine<s%> from now <S%G737>on,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> I <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> <S%G2537>anew<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%>'s <S%G932>Kingdom.<s%>"
<S%G2532>When<s%> they had sung a <S%G5214>hymn,<s%> they went <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G3735>Mount<s%> of <S%G1636>Olives.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3956>"All<s%> <S%G1722>of<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> will be made to <S%G4624>stumble<s%> because <S%G1722>of<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%> <S%G3571>tonight,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> <S%G3960><s%> 'I will strike the <S%G4166>shepherd,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4263>sheep<s%> of the <S%G4167>flock<s%> will be <S%G1287>scattered.<s%>'
<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G3165>I<s%> am raised <S%G1453>up,<s%> I will go <S%G4254>before<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee.<s%>"

But <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> "Even <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> will be made to <S%G4624>stumble<s%> because <S%G1722>of<s%> <S%G4671>you,<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G4624>will<s%> <S%G3763>never<s%> be made to <S%G4624>stumble.<s%>"

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5346>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> "Most <S%G281>certainly<s%> <S%G1722>I<s%> <S%G3004>tell<s%> <S%G4671>you<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3571>tonight,<s%> <S%G4250>before<s%> the <S%G220>rooster<s%> <S%G5455>crows,<s%> you will <S%G533>deny<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> three <S%G5151>times.<s%>"

<S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G846>him,<s%> "Even <S%G3165>if<s%> <S%G3165>I<s%> must <S%G599>die<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G4671>you,<s%> <S%G3165>I<s%> will <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G533>deny<s%> <S%G4671>you.<s%>" <S%G3956>All<s%> of the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G3668>likewise.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> a <S%G5564>place<s%> <S%G3004>called<s%> <S%G1068>Gethsemane,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> "Sit <S%G847>here,<s%> <S%G2193>while<s%> <S%G3739>I<s%> <S%G565>go<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> and <S%G4336>pray.<s%>"

<S%G2532>He<s%> took with <S%G3880>him<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5207>the<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G2199>Zebedee,<s%> and <S%G756>began<s%> to be <S%G3076>sorrowful<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> severely <S%G85>troubled.<s%>

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G3004>he<s%> said to <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3450>"My<s%> <S%G5590>soul<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> exceedingly <S%G4036>sorrowful,<s%> even <S%G2193>to<s%> <S%G2288>death.<s%> Stay <S%G5602>here,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1127>watch<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1700>me.<s%>"

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G4281>went<s%> <S%G3397>forward<s%> a <S%G4098>little,<s%> fell <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4383>face,<s%> and <S%G2532>prayed,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3450>"My<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1415>possible,<s%> <S%G3928>let<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G4221>cup<s%> <S%G3928>pass<s%> away <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1700>me;<s%> <S%G4133>nevertheless,<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5613>what<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G2309>desire,<s%> <S%G4133>but<s%> <S%G5613>what<s%> you <S%G4771>desire.<s%>"

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2518>sleeping,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to <S%G4074>Peter,<s%> <S%G3779>"What,<s%> <S%G3756>couldn't<s%> <S%G2480>you<s%> <S%G1127>watch<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%> for <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G5610>hour?<s%>

<S%G1127>Watch<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4336>pray,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> you <S%G3361>don't<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3986>temptation.<s%> The <S%G4151>spirit<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> is <S%G4289>willing,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> is <S%G772>weak.<s%>"

<S%G3825>Again,<s%> <S%G1537>a<s%> second <S%G1208>time<s%> he went <S%G565>away,<s%> and <S%G4336>prayed,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3450>"My<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G4221>cup<s%> <S%G3756>can't<s%> pass <S%G3928>away<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1700>me<s%> <S%G1437>unless<s%> <S%G3361>I<s%> <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G846>it,<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2307>desire<s%> be <S%G1096>done.<s%>"
